text: The 1908 Campeonato Carioca, the third edition of that championship, kicked off on May 3, 1908 and ended on November 1, 1908. It was organized by LMSA (Liga Metropolitana de Sports Athleticos, or Metropolitan Athletic Sports League).Not to be confused with the league of the same name that had organized the championship in 1907 Six teams participated. Fluminense won the title for the 3rd time. No teams were relegated. ==Participating teams== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Club !! Home location !!
